entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:38 PM AST Friday 24 February 2023
